name: GetProductVariantsInfo
description:
Retrieve information on product variants from a store.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about the variants of a specific product in an e-commerce store. Ideal for cases where users need to know different versions or options available for a product.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the store. Required to fetch product variant data.

parameters.name: product_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the product within the store.

value_schema.description: The id for the product of a store.

parameters.description: Specify the number of product variant records to return, default is 10, max is 1000.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.
